accessibility_rules.contrast: Ensure all text on colored backgrounds meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use 'text-white' on 'bg-primary'.
accessibility_rules.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements using 'focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-secondary'.
accessibility_rules.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.
accessibility_rules.alt_text: All images must have descriptive alt text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts for headings and 'DM Sans' for body.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Use HSL values for variable support.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Home' page first. Use the 'Hero Image' (boys in window) with a dark overlay gradient to ensure text readability.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for the 'Admin' dashboard but CUSTOM HTML/Tailwind for the public marketing pages to ensure unique branding.
5. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky header with a glassmorphism effect (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80).
6. FORMS: Use Netlify forms attributes (name='contact', method='POST', data-netlify='true') for the Contact and Support pages.
7. ADMIN: Secure the '/admin' route. Use a simple login layout.
8. FOOTER: Large footer with 'Deep Navy' background, 4 columns, and a newsletter signup.
9. TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, links, and inputs.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Use generous spacing (py-24, py-32).
Do not use gradients for text unless specifically requested.
Ensure mobile responsiveness for all images (max-h-[60vh] on mobile).
